title: The internet has a crush on Dr. Fauci
description:
From fan pages to food pics, Dr. Anthony Fauci is everywhere. The Verge’s Makena Kelly explains the person behind the meme. 

Featuring
@kellymakena
@FauciFan

Links to resources discussed:
Makena’s Article: https://www.theverge.com/2020/4/3/21206011/anthony-fauci-coronavirus-pandemic-stan-fandom-hero-donald-trump-white-house-task-force

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset
